checklist_name.description: A short descriptive name to human identify [PeterMU]

checklist_group.description: The collection of the experiment checklists[PeterMU]

checklist_version._comment: Version of the format v[[::digit::]] e..g. v2
checklist_version.description: The version of this checklist, allows us to validate the write records against the right checklist version[PeterMU]

experiment_type.description: The broad type of sequencing experiment performed. A mixture of library strategy and source[PeterMU]

description: Contained herein are the specific ENA experimental JSON schema describing what is need to validate specific checklists

_comment.description: This is an experiment attribute checklist template in JSON format. Please see https://github.com/Woolly-at-EBI/ExperimentChecklist/blob/main/docs/ExperimentChecklistDoc.html (NEED A PUBLIC URL) for details of what is mandatory and the allowable controlled vocabulary.

_comment2.description: This template allows 1 or more experiments' metadata to be submitted. If >1 experiments: in JSON style, please add a comma at the end of the previous record just after the closing }.

experiment_name.description: A unique name of the experiment within your study. An experiment is the sequencing activity that generates one or more sequencing runs on a specific sample. [ENA]

insert_size.description: The average insert size found during nucleic acid sequencing. [NCIT]

instrument_model._comment: will get values from the sra.experiment_xml
instrument_model.description: The name and/or number associated with a specific sequencing instrument model.  [NCIT-adapted]

instrument_platform._comment: will get values from the sra.experiment_xml
instrument_platform.description: The name of the technology platform used to perform nucleic acid sequencing. [NCIT]

library_description.description: The free description of the nucleotide sequencing library. [NCIT adapted]

library_name.description: The name of the nucleotide sequencing library. [NCIT]

library_selection.description: Method used to enrich the target in the sequence library preparation. [INSDC]

library_source.description: The LIBRARY_SOURCE specifies the type of source material that is being sequenced. [INSDC]

GENOMIC.description: Genomic DNA (includes PCR products from genomic DNA).

dict.OTHER: Other, unspecified, or unknown library source material.
dict.TRANSCRIPTOMIC: Transcription products or non genomic DNA (EST, cDNA, RT-PCR, screened libraries).

library_strategy.description: Sequencing technique intended for this library.[INSDC]

sample_accession.description: This is the study accession number that starts with ERP granted after registering a study with the ENA. [ENA]

sequencing_protocol._comment: if multiple protocols. use a pipe to delimited
sequencing_protocol.description: A rule which guides how an activity should be performed. This is for the sequencing related[NCIT]

title: PROTOTYPE Experimental Checklists JSON schema
